Articles.Content:
Hi everyone

Does exist a [0.20] compatible version of the "ed tools", this is a nice add-ons/mods for having more symmetry and control for the conception of rocket.

Here the copy/paste of the readme.txt of ed tolls.

Best regards

FEATURES:

=========

* Swap between mirror & symmetry part placement mode

* Up to 100x levels of symmetry (no longer limited to 8x)

* Go directly from the VAB to the runway (or SPH to the Launchpad)

* Additional rotational snapping options (1,5,15,30,45,90 degrees)

* Toggle vertical snap mode on/off

* Toggle part clipping and radial attachment modes (even for parts which can't normally attach radially)

* Build height/width limits removed

* Camera position limits removed

* VAB interior size massively increased

* Various command line options - load game directly to VAB/flight/etc

VAB/SPH KEY BINDINGS:

=====================

V - Toggle vertical snap mode

X - Increase level of symmetry

SHIFT + X - Decrease level of symmetry

ALT + X - Reset level of symmetry

C - Increase rotational snapping amount.

SHIFT + C - Decrease rotational snapping amount.

ALT + R - Toggle radial attachment for the part you're currently holding

Alt + Z - Toggle part clipping.

CTRL - Temporarily toggle part clipping (while key held)

PLANNED FEATURES: (just some stuff I'd like to add, nothing is confirmed)

=================

* Part failure indicator - after a flight, indicate which parts failed and in what order

* Crew assignment - fill empty pods with crew from within the VAB/SPH (I'll probably wait until .19 to add this)

* Additional launch sites, KSC2, Ocean, KSC Island runway, etc.

KNOWN BUGS:

===========

* Sometimes Clipping mode gets stuck on.

COMMAND LINE OPTIONS:

=====================

* KSP.exe {filename}.craft - load ship into the VAB/SPH

* KSP.exe /sph /vab /flight /tracking - load the 'default' save game directly into the respective scene (todo, add the ability to specify the save used)
Take a look here. I'm not sure if that's the version I'm using, as there are a few forum members that made it compatible. If it doesn't, I can send you mine.

Take a look here. I'm not sure if that's the version I'm using, as there are a few forum members that made it compatible. If it doesn't, I can send you mine.

Well the 0.1.2 of the link to the forum you give to me don't work with [0.20]

Well the 0.1.2 of the link to the forum you give to me don't work with [0.20]

OK sorry it works well now ;-) sorry and thank you very much

Please tell me that this is still being updated.

The main reason I used it was:

* VAB interior size massively increased
Has no one noticed that mirror/symmetry snapping is now in the stock game?

Has no one noticed that mirror/symmetry snapping is now in the stock game?

Editor Tools expands on the stock options. You can control the snap angle far more precisely (even down to 1 degree), can mirror up to 100 times, it offers a vertical snap, it increases the area within the VAB you can build (including raising the ceiling limit)...

It honestly is one of those few mods many players can't live without (myself included).
I installed it but i don't see any increase in sph / vab size, how do i get it to do that?

Editor Tools hasn't been updated by the author in quite a while. Editor Extensions has been kept up to date and contains similar functionality.

I've heard conflicting answers on whether or not that mod increases the VAB/SPH size.
The new Editor Extensions does NOT increase the building size because of many reasons. But the buildings are huge now, so you should never run out of space.
